law.catch_line: Kentucky Board of Hairdressers and Cosmetologists to administer KRS Chapter 317B -- Powers and duties.

text.section: The board shall administer and enforce this chapter and shall evaluate the qualifications of applicants for licensure and the issuance of licenses.
The board may employ inspectors, staff, and other personnel as reasonably necessary to carry out this chapter. The compensation shall be established by the board.
Administrative regulations pertaining to health and sanitation shall be approved by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services before becoming effective.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 19, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2003.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 675, instructs the Reviser of Statutes to correct statutory references to agencies and officers whose names have been changed in the Act, as it confirms the establishment of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services. Such a correction has been made in this section.
